column3: IOE, UCL’s Faculty of Education and Society
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis programme offers a comprehensive research training in developmental and educational psychology. It is recognised by the Economic and Social Research Council as providing the basis for further study at doctoral level.About this degreeStudents will develop in-depth knowledge of specialised research skills, and be able to use a broad range of methods to critically appraise and conduct rigorous research in the field. Through the optional modules, students have the opportunity to develop an thorough understanding of the cognitive, neurobiological and social mechanisms involved in child development and education.
column7: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
